articles.title: CBN Maintains Interest Rate at 18.75% to Curb Inflation
articles.summary: The Central Bank of Nigeria has kept the Monetary Policy Rate unchanged at 18.75% in its latest meeting to combat persistent inflation.

articles.title: Nigeria's Inflation Drops to 21.3% in December 2024
articles.summary: The National Bureau of Statistics reports inflation fell to 21.3% in December 2024, down from 21.5% in November.

articles.title: Naira Stabilizes at ₦890/$ in Parallel Market
articles.summary: The Nigerian naira has stabilized around ₦890 to the US dollar following recent Central Bank interventions in the forex market.

articles.title: NNPC Reports $2.8 Billion Oil Revenue for January 2025
articles.summary: The Nigerian National Petroleum Corporation announced $2.8 billion in oil revenue for January 2025, showing recovery in the sector.
